raidTimeLimit.__comment_raidTimeLimit: Set how long raids last on each map (in minutes). Map names are shown in the comments.

weightChanger.__comment_percent: Global percent when no per-item or per-parent match. 100% keeps default. 50% halves. 0% makes items 0 weight, 400% makes it 4 times as heavy.
weightChanger.__comment_perParentPercent: Use parent id or _name to percent. Applies to all items with that _parent. (use https://db.sp-tarkov.com)
weightChanger.__comment_perItemPercent: Use item id or _name to percent. Overrides parent and global. (use https://db.sp-tarkov.com)
weightChanger.__comment_whitelistItem: Will only edit these items. Id or _name. Empty means no restriction.
weightChanger.__comment_blacklistItem: Will not edit these items. Id or _name. Overrides all.
